snippet: About 86 percent of customer service employees at the merged American Airlines-US Airways voted in favor of union representation.
abstract: National Mediation Board announces that customer service agents for American Airlines and US Airways have voted in favor of union representation, in wake of merger of two carriers; agents will be represented by Communications Workers of America, or in some cases, the Teamsters.
lead_paragraph: About 86 percent of customer service employees at the merged American Airlines-US Airways voted in favor of union representation.

headline.main: After American Airlines-US Airways Merger, Agents Vote to Unionize
headline.print_headline: After Merger of 2 Airlines, Agents Vote to Unionize
